segments.text: Do you have any hobbies ? What is it or what are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am interested in watching TV or other relaxing games .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you spend your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually read or entertain myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of books are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My favorite books are those about detectives .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , those books are really good . I like them too . How do you entertain yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When it comes to the entertainment , I think I enjoy dancing . There is nothing I like more than modern dance .
segments.speaker: S2
